name: xAAVEProxy
description: Proxy - Generic proxy contract allows to execute all transactions.

functionDecorators.name: confirmAdminTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Changes the admin address to the previously proposed admin address if 24 hours has past since it was proposed.

functionDecorators.name: confirmImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Confirms a previously proposed implementation if the sender is one of the two cosigners.

parameterDecorators.name: confirmedImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: the address of previously proposed implementation (has to match the previously proposed implementation).

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the implementation contract of this proxy.

functionDecorators.name: proposeAdminTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Proposes a new admin address if the sender is the Admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newAdminAddress
parameterDecorators.description: address of the new admin role.

functionDecorators.name: proposeNewImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Proposes a new implementation contract for this proxy if sender is the Admin.

parameterDecorators.name: newImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new implementation.

functionDecorators.name: proposedNewAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the new proposed admin address of this proxy (if there is no proposed implementations, returns address(0x0)).

functionDecorators.name: proposedNewAdminTimestamp
functionDecorators.description: Returns the timestamp that the proposed admin can be changed/confirmed.

functionDecorators.name: proposedNewImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Returns the new proposed implementation address of this proxy (if there is no proposed implementations, returns address(0x0)).

functionDecorators.name: proxyAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin address of this proxy.

functionDecorators.name: proxySigner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the first cosigner if 'id' == 0, otherwise returns the address of the second cosigner.

functionDecorators.name: proxyType
functionDecorators.description: Returns the proxy type, specified by EIP-897.
